definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to get out of bed/to get up
to go to bed/(coll.) to have sex
hotbed/breeding ground/fig. breeding ground for crimes or sedition

sentences.english: The big bed was specially made for Yao Ming, the giant basketball player.
sentences.chinese: 这张大床是为篮坛巨人姚明特制的。

sentences.english: Some colleges provide beds that can be lofted on their own.
My friends who got under the bed and under desks were crushed to death …
sentences.chinese: 我的友朋们，这些藏在床下，桌女下的人皆死了。

sentences.english: SUSAN: I didn't realize anyone was gonna be out here, I just sorta rolled outta bed.
sentences.chinese: 我没想到外面会有人，我只是裹点什么起了床。

sentences.english: A nursing bed which can disassemble and assemble flexibly and used for paralytic relates to a bed.
sentences.chinese: 可灵活拆装的瘫痪病人护理床，它涉及一种床。

sentences.english: A nursing bed which can disassemble and assemble flexibly and used for paralytic relates to a bed.
sentences.chinese: 可灵活拆装的瘫痪病人护理床，它涉及一种床。

sentences.english: I figured the store would give us guff about exchanging it.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得要想把床退回去恐怕要费一番唇舌。

sentences.english: Platform beds or canopies are better choices for smaller rooms.
sentences.chinese: 平台式床或帐篷是较小的房间的不错的选择。

sentences.english: It adds some great contrast to the white linens and wardrobes.
sentences.chinese: 和白色的衣柜和床形成了对比。

sentences.english: Lo: A king-sized bed sounds great.
The production intensity of the smelting furnace with a coke packed bed is very high.
sentences.chinese: 带有焦炭充填床的粉尘熔化炉，具有很高的冶炼强度。

sentences.english: Jesus was born in a stable and a manger was used as his bed.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣诞生在马厩内，马秣槽被用作他的床。

sentences.english: Clamp-on bed rail system ensures a no drill installation that is fast and easy.
sentences.chinese: 钳式床铁路系统确保了无钻安装快速又简单。

sentences.english: Make your bed. Do it now.
You can toss it under the bed, turn out the light, and head into dreamland.
sentences.chinese: 把它丢到床底下，关上灯，进入你自己的梦乡。

sentences.english: This thesis introduces a type of portable field first -aid diagnosis bed used in field medical aid station .
sentences.chinese: 一种适用于野战救护所的便携式野战急救诊断床。

definition: spring mattress (loanword from "Simmons" bedding company name)
sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
